name: Night & Day (itch)
description:
Night & Day

Night & Day is a 2D local co-op puzzle game. It features many unique levels with different obstacles, from jumping over spikes to moving saw's and platforms! Sleek looking User-Interface, relaxing puzzle solving music both ingame and in menus.

Gameplay: The game is inspired by Fireboy & Watergirl. The aim is that 2 players playing on one PC help each other. One player is playing as night and the other as day. Levels increase in difficulty as you progress and you get new obstacles such as saw's, more spikes as well as pressure plates! Short and easy levels in the beginning, longer and harder levels as you progress! Controls:  -Player one controls- W - jump A - walk left D - walk right -Player two controls- Up arrow - jump Left arrow - walk left Right arrow - walk right

This game was made in a 8 day period during Unity education at PISMO Novska. It's a part of our course on Unity, specifially project managing! The theme was "Day and Night".
